title: Awarding term contracts for fuel purchasing
decision_details:
- The Cabinet approved the  proposals made by the Minister of Energy to award the following term contracts relating to the purchase of fuel for the period of eight months from 2021‑06‑01 to 2022‑01‑31 as recommended by the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee. 

		*Awarding the term contract for the import of 2,700,000+10/-5% of 		  Gasoline (92 Unl) to M/s Swiss Singapore Overseas Enterprises Pte. 		  Ltd., 	Singapore.

		*Awarding the term contract for the Single Berth Delivery of 			1,120,000+10/-5% Bbls of Gas oil (0.05% of maximum sulphur) at 			SPM Muthurajawela to M/s Petrochina International (Singapore) Pte. 		Ltd., Singapore.


		*Awarding the term contract for the import of 1,341,000+10/-5% of 		  Gasoline (92 Unl) and 459,000+10/-5% of Gasoline (95 Unl) to M/s 		Petrochina International (Singapore) Pte. Ltd., Singapore.

		*Awarding the term contract for the for 	Duel Berth Discharge of		1,120,000+10/-5% Bbls of Gas oil (0.05% of maximum sulphur) at 	Dolphin Tanker Berth (DTB) and SPM 	Muthurajawela, to 	M/s 	Petrochina International (Singapore) Pte. Ltd., Singapore.
